DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate long-term safety efficacy pregabalin patient postherpetic neuralgia .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Long-Term Safety Efficacy Pregabalin Patients With Postherpetic Neuralgia .
DOC.criteria: Must meet inclusion criterion precede doubleblind BID study postherpetic neuralgia Must receive pregabalin/placebo doubleblind condition minimum 3 week . Patients participate experience serious adverse event precede doubleblind BID study determine related study medication .
